alert.note: Alert for Estill; Powell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 9:52PM EST until February 05 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Red River at Clay City affecting Powell and Estill Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River at Clay City. * WHEN...Through early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Maple street near the Red River Ranch as well as Pompeii Road off of Highway 15 are impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.0 feet by early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 8 AM.
